statements: SELECT * FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_date, purchase_amount FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase_amount FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) >= 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, join_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_lifetime_value WHERE lifetime_value > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_lifetime_value WHERE lifetime_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT clv.customer_id, clv.lifetime_value, c.customer_name FROM customer_lifetime_value clv JOIN customers c ON clv.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY clv.lifetime_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE first_purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, price, category FROM products WHERE price <= 50.00;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, lifetime_value FROM customer_lifetime_value WHERE lifetime_value > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT c.name, clv.lifetime_value FROM customers c JOIN customer_lifetime_value clv ON c.customer_id = clv.customer_id;
